meanings.definition: A unit of digital information equal to 1 trillion bytes.
meanings.sent1: My new computer has a terabyte of storage space for all my photos.
meanings.sent2: The external hard drive I bought can store a terabyte of movies and music.
meanings.sent3: I never realized how much a terabyte really is until I tried to fill it with cat videos.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a terabyte, storing every detail of every moment.
meanings.sent5: The terabyte of data felt like a mountain of information, waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: The capacity of a storage device or system to hold one terabyte of data.
meanings.sent1: The new smartphone boasts a terabyte of storage, perfect for all your apps and photos.
meanings.sent2: I need to upgrade my computer's hard drive to accommodate a terabyte of files.
meanings.sent3: Carrying around a terabyte of data in my pocket makes me feel like a digital superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was like a terabyte, holding an impressive amount of random items.
meanings.sent5: The terabyte capacity of the cloud storage service was a lifesaver for backing up important documents.
